sentences.sContent: He asked her to pledge the house as security for a loan.
sentences.sCn: 他要她抵押房子作为贷款担保。

synos.tran: 保证，誓言；[经]抵押；抵押品，典当物
保证，许诺；用……抵押；举杯祝……健康

remMethod.val: pled(看作plead， 恳求) + ge(音似： 哥) → 哥哥发誓要改邪归正， 恳求大家的饶恕 → 发誓

words.tran: 接受抵押或人；接受保证者
立誓人；抵押者，典当者；举杯祝酒的人

trans.tranOther: something valuable that you leave with someone else as proof that you will do what you have agreed to do
